mapper.insert: insert into WISDOM.RESOURCERESULT (PNO, GXID, GXNAME, AR140620E5, AR130822E4, AR101P01, AR101P02, AR101P03, AR101P04) values (#{pno,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{gxid,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{gxname,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{ar140620e5,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{ar130822e4,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{ar101p01,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{ar101p02,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{ar101p03,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{ar101p04,jdbcType=CHAR})
